00018 struct LightCurveParams {
00019 
00020   double maxNeighborDist;
00021   unsigned maxFiducials;
00022   int matchOrder;
00023   // constructor with default values
00024   LightCurveParams() {
00025     maxNeighborDist = 5;// maximum fiducial distance to a neigbor
00026     matchOrder = 3;     // geometric matching order among nights
00027     maxFiducials = 50;  // max number of fiducials stars to produce a lightcurve simultaneously
00028   }
00029 };

00069 
00070 /* \page lcresults Lightcurve results
00071 
00072 Processing time depends on seeing and 
00073 pixel resolution of all images. A gigantic amount of output files are
00074 saved on disk. For each band, the following files are created:
00075  \arg all resampled DbImage's
00076  \arg co-added DbImage's
00077  \arg subtracted DbImage's
00078  \arg all vignets for your candidates (data,psf,kernel,residuals...) as FITS files
00079  \arg one ASCII file per band of the fiducials lightcurve results
00080  (simultaneous fit)    
00081  \arg one ASCII file per band of the fiducials lightcurve results
00082  (aperture on subtraction) 
00083  \arg one ASCII file per band for covariance matrix from simultaneous fit
00084  \arg all fiducial kernel and data vignets (removed when the program has
00085  finished running) 
00086 
00087 Problems encountered can be numerous. Most common are:
00088 \arg PSF DAOPHOT problem. Removed the huge core and rerun.
00089 \arg Image registration problem. Check you have WCS in headers. Rerun.
00090 \arg Other: email sfabbro@in2p3.fr
00091 */
00092 
00093 
00094 #endif // LIGHTCURVEGURU__H
